definition[0]: if a situation is looking up, it is improving
example[0]: Now the summer’s here things are looking up!
definition[1]: if you look up information in a book, on a computer etc, you try to find it there
example[1]: Look the word up in your dictionary.
example[2]: I’ll just look up the train times.
definition[2]: to visit someone you know, especially when you are in the place where they live for a different reason
example[3]: Don’t forget to look me up when you come to Atlanta.
example[4]: Things are looking up for High Street retailers.
